DeleteAccount.title: Delete your account
DeleteAccount.label: You can delete you Cozy at anytime. Be careful, once your account is deleted, your data will entirely be deleted, there is no going back.

error.message: An error occurred during account deletion request. Please retry or contact our support.

line.2: You will not be able to access your Cozy anymore
line.3: All your data will be removed
line.4: Please enter your password to validate this action:

errors.invalid_password: Your password doesn't seem to be correct
errors.server_error: An error has occurred, please try again

reason.label: Why do you want to delete your Cozy (optionnal)?

email_confirmation.title: Open your mails
email_confirmation.description: An email has been sent to **%{email}**. In order to confirm the deletion of your account, please click on the confirmation link in this email.

success.message: Your deletion request has been sent.

Nav.primary_lock_switch: Lock when the app goes into background

devices.title: You don't have any connected devices
devices.text: By installing the various clients, you will be able to access your files on all your screens et simultaneously. Cozy will always be at hand reach, even if you are always on the road!

instance.server_error: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.

password.title: Password
password.label: Your cozy is currently protected by a password

infos.server_error: Something went wrong. Your informations has not been saved.

password_creation.title: Choose a password
password_creation.help: Use at least eight characters with letters, numbers and symbols.

passphrase.title: Two steps authentication
passphrase.description:
Your Cozy sent a 6 digits validation code to %{email}.
Entre the code inside to change your password:

twofa.label:
Because two steps are better than one, improve your Cozy security with an additional step.
[Check out our assistance website ‚Üí](%{link})

modal.protect: Protect your Cozy with two steps authentication
modal.change:
**What's changing?** Everytime you'll connect to your Cozy, you'll need your password and a validation code.
[Check out our assistance website ‚Üí](%{link})
modal.secu_description: Password, that's good, but if it isn't "complicated", a thief can easily guess it. Receive a validation code by mail assures the control of your Cozy.
modal.protect_title: Improve the protection of your data
modal.protect_description: Even if a thief gets your password, you stay the only captain able to connect to your Cozy
modal.desactivate_title: Are you sure to disable this option?
modal.desactivate_description: On clicking on "Desactivate" button, your password will be the only key to access your Cozy. You will delete a security level.
modal.confirmation_description: Enter the verification code that has just been emailed to you at **%{email}**
modal.nocode: You do not receive any code?
modal.validation_description: Your Cozy is now secured with 2 steps.
modal.email: You should provide a valid email address

public_name.title: Username
public_name.label: Your username will be displayed when you share files with Cozy users.

phone_number.title: Phone number
phone_number.label: Your phone number will be used to send you notifications and to enable you to recover your password.

default_redirection.title: Home screen
default_redirection.label: This is the first screen you will see when you open your Cozy.

tracking.title: Help us to improve our product
tracking.label: Authorize Cozy Cloud to get anonymously your usage data to improve our product.

move.label: Change your Cozy without losing your data

export.title: My data
export.label: Save all your Cozy data
export.server_error: Something went wrong, please try again or contact us.
export.fetch_error: Something went wrong when fetching your export data. Please try again or contact us.
export.missing_error: The archive seems to be missing or expired. Please try again or contact us.
export.success: Your request has correctly be sent!

modal.title: Get back my data
modal.description:
Cozy is in charge of getting all data that its has about you and to send you an archive to download.

The download link will be sent to you to the __%{email}__ email address when the archive will be available.

download.title: Download my data
download.description: Here are all the data archive(s) available from your Cozy:

import.label: Import your data coming from another Cozy
import.server_error: Something went wrong, pleasy try again or contact us.
import.invalid_url: The link does not seem to correspond to the download link of a Cozy.
import.quota_too_small: The storage space of your Cozy is insufficient to import all your data. 2 solutions are available: increase the storage space of your Cozy or delete the data not required for import.

modal.title: Import a Cozy
modal.description: Fill in the download link sent by email below. To retrieve the download link for a Cozy, you just have to launch its export.

confirmation.title: Warning
confirmation.description:
When importing, the data already present in your Cozy **%{url}** will be overwritten. Access to your Cozy will be blocked until the end of this operation.

Do you really want to continue?

locale.title: Language
locale.label: This will be the language used in your Cozy.

DevicesView.load_error: An error occured while loading your devices, please try again later.
DevicesView.device_load_error: We could not find the requested device.

revokeDevice.subText: It will immediately stop syncing with this device.

PassphraseView.title: Update my password

advices.strong_passphrase: **Privilege a strong password:** A long password with numbers and special characters will be impossible to break.
advices.memorize: **Memorize it well:** In case of loss, you will not be able to recover the encrypted passwords in your cozy.
advices.our_tip: **Our tip:** Find a short phrase that suits you, for example:

hint.title: Leave a hint
hint.description: The hint will be emailed to you if you forget your password, choose a hint that only you can understand
hint.same_as_passphrase: Your hint can not be your password

PassphraseView.server_error: Something went wrong. Your password has not been saved.
PassphraseView.wrong_two_fa_code: The provided two factor code seems wrong.

BiometryDeniedDialog.content: To activate this feature, the app needs authorization to access FaceID

soon.title: Coming soon
soon.description: This feature is not available yet. For more information, please contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc

support.title: Hi! Can we help you?
support.emailDetail: Your message will be sent from your email address saved in your Cozy settings.

message.title: Your request
message.placeholder: Tell us anything (ask for help, share a feedback or just say hello). We'll be happy to talk to you.

consent.label: I temporarily authorize the Cozy Cloud support to view the necessary data in my Cozy, for the unique purpose of answering this question

response_email.subject: Your request has been correctly received
response_email.allowConsent: Thank you for temporarily allowing Cozy Cloud support to view the necessary data in my Cozy, for the unique purpose of answering your question.
response_email.body:
Hello,

We correctly received your support request:
%{message}

We are doing our best to respond you as soon as possible.

Claude from Cozy.

support.success: üëè Your message has been sent. Thank you!
support.error: An error occured while sending your message

mobile.title: Back up and sync your pics from your mobile

Permissions.title: Applications control
Permissions.access: Applications with this permission can access your
Permissions.monthly_stats_phrase: Data release report from your cozy to %{app} on %{date}:
Permissions.exit_rights_secondary: The data can be taken out of the Cozy, it will not be kept secret anymore
Permissions.limited_right_access_secondary: The data is only accessible locally, it never leaves your Cozy.
Permissions.exit_right_description: The data is accessible outside the Cozy. It can be transmitted to the outside
Permissions.access_right_description: Data is only accessible locally in your Cozy. %{app} cannot transmit data outside of the Cozy Cloud or to anyone else.
Permissions.read_right_text: The app can read the data inside the Cozy without making it accessible to its editor
Permissions.write_right_text: The app can add, modify, or delete data

EmailSection.title: E-mail
EmailSection.subtitle: Cozy needs your e-mail address to send you notifications and to enable you to recover your password.

alert.title: Modification pending
alert.content: An email has been sent to %{pendingEmail} to verify your identity and finalise the change to your email address.

snackbar.server_error: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.
snackbar.resend_success: An email has been sent to %{pendingEmail}

errors.server: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.
errors.same_email: Your new email cannot be the same as your old one.
errors.email_format: The e-mail address does not feel right. Are you sure you wrote it correctly (e.g. john@wayne.com)?

included.title: Included in your plan:

flags.drive.office.write: Online Office documents editor (word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation)

included.accounts_offer: (%{max} included in the offer + 1 offered) |||| (%{max} included in the offer + %{smart_count} offered)

content.delete:
You have subscribed to a Cozy offer via the %{vendor}. **Please cancel your subscription before deleting your Cozy account.**

If you have already done so, or if you wish to do so later directly via your store, you can ignore this message and continue deleting your Cozy.
content.move:
You have subscribed to a Cozy offer via the %{vendor}. **Please cancel your subscription before moving your Cozy account.**

If you have already done so, or if you wish to do so later directly via your store, you can ignore this message and continue moving your Cozy.
